amendments.title: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to revise Title III, Part 3, Election Infrastructure Innovation Grant Program, to include an emphasis on increasing voter participation, engage the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), and increase funding for the competitive grants.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Lujan amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to protect the ability of 501(c)4s to advocate for causes by striking a provision intended to allow for additional IRS regulation of 501(c)4s.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 237 (Roll no. 114).

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 72 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to authorize the commission to refuse to certify a candidate to participate in the matching public finance program if they have been assessed three or more civil penalties in one or more elections previously and makes a candidate not eligible if there has been a willful violation. The amendment references criminal penalties for violations of the law.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to strike Title IV, subtitle F, which would allow the SEC to require disclosure of political contributions made by public corporations.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 238 (Roll no. 113).

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require verification value of credit cards for the purchase of online advertising.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Kirkpatrick amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to ensure that states that have taken appropriate measures to increase voter turnout are not subject to additional federal voter registration mandates.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Davidson (OH) amendment (A030) Failed by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to allow 16 and 17-year-olds to pre-register to vote ahead of their 18th birthday.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A052) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 186 (Roll no. 116).

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to call for a GAO report on the challenges and progress made in making elections accessible for those with disabilities, including an assessment of the impact of changes included in H.R. 1.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require voting registration materials to be sent with notification of restoration of rights.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require the Judicial Conference of the United States to implement a judicial code that is at least as stringent as the requirements placed on Members of Congress.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A027) Failed by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to provide that States shall permit an individual who receives a vote by mail ballot to cast the ballot on the date of the election by delivering the ballot to a polling place.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to direct the Election Assistance Commission to carry out a pilot program under which the Commission shall provide funds during the one-year period beginning after the date of enactment, to local educational agencies for initiatives to provide voter registration information to secondary school students in the 12th grade.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Green (TX) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to express a sense of Congress that free speech should be protected.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Green (TN) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 233 (Roll no. 112).

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to lower the mandatory minimum voting age to age 16 in federal elections.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 305, 2 Present (Roll no. 111).

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to remove the granting of subpoena authority to the Director of the Office of Government Ethics.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Hice (GA) amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendment Nos. 35, 36, 40, 41, 42, 44, 46, 50, 51, 52, 53, 55, 59, 60, 65, 66, and 67 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendments (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 69 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to expand the ban on foreign money entering elections to include electioneering communications.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Slotkin amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require the Director of National Intelligence to provide state election officials and Congress an assessment regarding risks and threats to election infrastructure 180 days before a general election.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require all paper ballots used in an election for Federal office to be printed in the US on paper manufactured in the US.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Kim amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to extend the guarantee of residency for purposes of voting to family members of absent military personnel.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Trahan amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
